titleInfo.title: Letter No. 135 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Political and Secret Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports receiving a reply from Mirza Hossein in which he expresses his friendship for the English nation. The letter discusses the arrival and activities of John Morrison and John Biggs in detail. Galley promises to closely monitor their activities and to report back to Bombay with any relevant intelligence.
